author-notes.corresp: Address correspondence to David Bonsall, david.bonsall@bdi.ox.ac.uk.

fn.p: David Bonsall and Tanya Golubchik contributed equally to this work, and the order in which they are listed reflects a decreasing order of managerial responsibility for the project.

Citation Bonsall D, Golubchik T, de Cesare M, Limbada M, Kosloff B, MacIntyre-Cockett G, Hall M, Wymant C, Ansari MA, Abeler-DÃ¶rner L, Schaap A, Brown A, Barnes E, Piwowar-Manning E, Eshleman S, Wilson E, Emel L, Hayes R, Fidler S, Ayles H, Bowden R, Fraser C, HPTN 071 (PopART) Team. 2020. A comprehensive genomics solution for HIV surveillance and clinical monitoring in low-income settings. J Clin Microbiol 58:e00382-20. https://doi.org/10.1128/JCM.00382-20.
